name: panhandler
description: AI Agent Orchestration System for Autonomous Software Development

scripts.dev:all: bun run build:deps && concurrently "bun run dev:api" "bun run dev:web"
scripts.dev:full: bun run services:start && bun run dev:all
scripts.build: bun run build:deps && bun run --filter '*' build
scripts.build:deps: bun run --filter '@panhandler/types' build && bun run --filter '@panhandler/core' build
scripts.build:sequential: bun run --filter '@panhandler/types' build && bun run --filter '@panhandler/core' build && bun run --filter '@panhandler/agents' build && bun run --filter '@panhandler/web' build
scripts.watch: bun run --filter '@panhandler/types' build && bun run --filter '@panhandler/core' build && bun run --filter '*' dev
scripts.test:ci: bun run type-check && bun run lint && bun run test
scripts.test:full: bun run test:db-up && sleep 5 && bun run test && bun run test:db-down
scripts.clean:full: bun run clean && rm -rf node_modules && bun install
scripts.setup: bun install && bun run build:deps && bun run db:setup
scripts.setup:fresh: bun run clean:full && bun run setup
scripts.db:reset: bun scripts/migrate.ts rollback && bun scripts/migrate.ts migrate
scripts.precommit: bun run type-check && bun run lint && bun run format:check
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production bun run build:production && bun run services:start && bun run --filter '@panhandler/agents' start
scripts.docs:serve: bun run docs:generate && cd docs/api && python3 -m http.server 8080

author: Your Name
